Reference

All functions

Baseline hazard

Bootstrap Validation for Survival Model

Calculate cutpoints/breaks

eldd

End-stage Liver Disease Data

eldr

End-stage Liver Disease Reference

enum()

Format enumeration

groupmean()

Groupwise mean

meld() meld_na() pmeld() pmeld_plus7()

Calculate MELD scores

Calculate observed survival informations

Calculate observed vs expected mortality

Plot the elastic net cross-validation curves

Plot the bootstrap results.

plot(<rcv.glmnet>)

Plot the cross-validation curve

Plot dotchart

Plot method for 'survfit' objects

plot_table()

Plot a table

Predictions for a rcv.glmnet object

Repeated Cross-Validation for cv.glmnet
